sentence: at todays meeting the governing council of the ecb took the following monetary policy decisions the interest rate on the main refinancing operations of the eurosystem will be decreased by 25 basis points to 125 starting from the operation to be settled on 9 november 2011 the interest rate on the marginal lending facility will be decreased by 25 basis points to 200 with effect from 9 november 2011 the interest rate on the deposit facility will be decreased by 25 basis points to 050 with effect from 9 november 2011 the president of the ecb will comment on the considerations underlying these decisions at a press conference starting at 230 pm cet today
